medical_history: History of hypothyroidism diagnosed in 2020, managed with levothyroxine. Allergic to penicillin. Reports occasional migraines.
Patient has Type 2 Diabetes, managed with metformin and diet. Underwent an appendectomy in 2015. History of hypertension, controlled with lisinopril.
Diagnosed with Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD) in 2022, prescribed sertraline. No major surgical history. Reports seasonal allergies.
